text:
神情
眼睛： 瞪大雙眼； 眼睛笑得像月牙兒 （同學）投來羨慕的眼光
（媽媽）眼裏泛著光
眉毛： 原本皺成一團的眉毛立刻舒展開來 （媽媽）眉開眼笑
嘴巴： 嘴角上揚，快要咧到耳後根去了
其他： 臉色蒼白；臉紅得像紅蘋果 （老師）笑容滿面
動作 手： 摳手指；雙手合十； （同學）鼓掌；豎起大拇指
（媽媽）摸摸我的頭
腳： 手舞足蹈；一蹦一跳
對話 我做到了！ 我做到了！ （同學）恭喜你（老師）繼續努力
（媽媽）你真棒！
trans:
Expression
Eyes: eyes wide open; eyes smiling like crescent moons (Classmates) cast envious glances
(Mother) tears in the eyes
Eyebrows: The eyebrows that were originally frowning immediately relax (Mother) smiling happily
Mouth: The corners of the mouth are raised, almost reaching behind the ears.
Others: pale; blushing like a red apple (Teacher) smiling broadly
Action Hands: picking fingers; putting hands together; (Classmates) applauding; giving a thumbs up
(Mother) Touching my head
Feet: dancing in joy; jumping
Dialogue I did it! I did it! (Classmates) Congratulations (Teacher) Keep up the hard work
(Mother) You are awesome!
